## Context: What is DSW? 
- Allows researchers to fill in single questionnaire about their research
- A Data Management Plan (DMP) can then be generate for different funders, and in different formats

::: {layout-ncol=2}
![Questionnaire](images/smart-questionnaire.png)

![Export](images/machine-actionable-export.png)
:::

## Context: Why DSW for UKCEH?
- Replace outdated Word Document approach to DMPs
- Give researchers better support to make their data **Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable (FAIR)**
- Gain insight into datasets generated by each research project
- The goal ultimately is **to make everyone's life easier & improve DMP quality**

## Impacts
- All ongoing and new projects migrated to DSW
- Eliminating duplicated effort of researchers
- Reducing Data Stewardship team workload
- Better insight into datasets created by UKCEH
- Continuous feedback through Github issues
